name: Apple Bundle Dark (+ Developer)
description:
Dark theme for apple website (Store, Compare, Support, Chat and more) & apple developers' pages (Documentation, App Store Connect, Forum and more).

Please tell me if there is any bug/issue to fix or any improvements you'd like to suggest and I'll try to do my best to fix/implement this (:

* Based on: https://userstyles.org/styles/174986/apple-developer-documentation-dark & https://userstyles.org/styles/172950/apple-developer-panel-dark
additional_info: Please tell me if there is any bug/issue to fix or any improvements you'd like to suggest and I'll try to do my best to fix/implement this (:
